batonPass.name: Baton Pass
batonPass.description: Pass turn to another after 1 More, increasing their attack and recovery.

shadowTalk.name: {0} Talk
shadowTalk.description: Chance to step in and save a failed shadow negotiation.

followUp.name: Follow Up
followUp.description: Chance to follow up after Joker's attack.

harisenRecovery.name: Harisen Recovery
harisenRecovery.description: Chance to remove status ailments from party members when in the party.

endure.name: Endure
endure.description: Chance to survive an attack that would otherwise kill.

protect.name: Protect
protect.description: Will take a blow that would otherwise kill Joker.

crocodileTears.name: Crocodile Tears
crocodileTears.description: Chance to further lower demands during shadow negotiation.

sexyTechnique.name: Sexy Technique
sexyTechnique.description: Chance to further lower demands during shadow negotiation

luckReading.name: Luck Reading
luckReading.description: Pay 5000 Yes to increase your chance of increasing a chosen social stat for the rest of the day.

affinityReading.name: Affinity Reading
affinityReading.description: Pay 5000 Yen to boost your relationship with a chosen confidant. +3 if you have a matching persona, +2 otherwise.

fateReading.name: Fate Reading
fateReading.description: Pay 5000 Yen to reveal upcoming abilities for all confidants.

specialFateReading.name: Special Fate Reading
specialFateReading.description: Pay 5000 Yen to reveal all abilities for a chosen confidant.

moralSupport.name: Moral Support
moralSupport.description: Chance to cast buffing magic during battle.

mementosScan.name: Mementos Scan
mementosScan.description: Chance to reveal an entire floor of Mementos on arrival.

positionHack.name: Position Hack
positionHack.description: Chance to start a battle with a hold-up.

activeSupport.name: Active Support
activeSupport.description: Upgrades Moral Support to sometimes charge up, focus, or recover SP.

treasureReboot.name: Treasure Reboot
treasureReboot.description: Chance to refresh all searchable objects in a Palace after a battle.

emergencyShift.name: Emergency Shift
emergencyShift.description: Chance to automatically swap out two KOed party memebers.

finalGuard.name: Final Guard
finalGuard.description: Chance to block attacks that would a KO party member(s).

cultivation.name: Cultivation
cultivation.description: Haru can grow SP recovering vegetables on the roof of Shujin Academy.

soilImprovement.name: Soil Improvement
soilImprovement.description: Reduce the time it takes vegetables to grow.

komaSabaki.name: Koma Sabaki
komaSabaki.description: On Joker's turn, swap out any party memebers by pressing L2 and selecting "Party".

uchikomi.name: Uchikomi
uchikomi.description: Chance for non-present allies to attack after an enemy is downed.

kazoiKuzushi.name: Kazoi Kuzushi
kazoiKuzushi.description: Allows attempts to escape from battle even when surrounded.

nakirin.name: Nakirin
nakirin.description: Chance to get double money if you start a battle with an ambush, and win within one party turn.

touryou.name: Touryou
touryou.description: Removes the need to wait before escaping from battle.

togoSystem.name: Togo System
togoSystem.description: On any party member's turn, swap them out by pressing L2 and selecting "Party".

shockingScoop.name: Shocking Scoop
shockingScoop.description: Further increases the effects of Rumor-filled Scoop.

rumorFilledScoop.name: Rumor-filled Scoop
rumorFilledScoop.description: Palace alertness levels will be harder to increase and theyâ€™ll decrease a small amount by the next day.

outrageousScoop.name: Outrageous Scoop
outrageousScoop.description: Further increases the effects of Rumor-filled Scoop.

legendaryScoop.name: Legendary Scoop
legendaryScoop.description: Eliminates Palace alertness increases, and Palace alertness levels will drop to zero overnight.

starterCustomization.name: Starter Customization
starterCustomization.description: Allows you to customize guns to improve their performance.

mediumCustomization.name: Medium Customization
mediumCustomization.description: Allows you to customize mid-grade guns.

discount.name: Discount
discount.description: Decrease the cost of gun customization.

expertCustomization.name: Expert Customization
expertCustomization.description: Allows you to customize high-grade guns.

aceCustomization.name: Ace Customization
aceCustomization.description: Allows you to customize special-grade guns.

wildTalk.name: Wild Talk
wildTalk.description: Allows negotiation with Shadows during a hold up.

arcanaBurst.name: Arcana Burst
arcanaBurst.description: Grant bonus EXP when fusing a Persona based on the rank of the Confidant with the corresponding Arcana.

highArcanaBurst.name: High Arcana Burst
highArcanaBurst.description: Increase the effect of Arcana Burst.

maxArcanaBurst.name: Max Arcana Burst
maxArcanaBurst.description: Further increase the effect of High Arcana Burst.

thirdEye.name: Third Eye
thirdEye.description: Lets you see hidden information by pressing L2.

trueJudgement.name: True Judgement
trueJudgement.description: "????????". Note: True Judgement appears to have no effects.

shadowCalculus.name: Shadow Calculus
shadowCalculus.description: See potential item drops of enemies from the analyze screen.

shadowFactorization.name: Shadow Factorization
shadowFactorization.description: See whether an attack will be effective or not while targeting.

mishimasSupport.name: Mishima's Support
mishimasSupport.description: Allow backup members to earn some EXP from battle.

mishimasDesperation.name: Mishima's Desperation
mishimasDesperation.description: Increase EXP earned by backup members.

phanboy.name: Phanboy
phanboy.description: Greatly increase EXP earned from battle.

salvationWish.name: Salvation Wish
salvationWish.description: Backup members earn full EXP from battle.

infiltrationTools.name: Infiltration Tools
infiltrationTools.description: Allowins you to spend time in your room crafting infiltration tools like lockpicks.

pickpocket.name: Pickpocket
pickpocket.description: Chance to obtain an item after Joker lands a melee attack.

aceTools.name: Ace Tools
aceTools.description: Allows you to craft all types of infiltration tools.

instaKill.name: Insta-Kill
instaKill.description: Chance to instantly win a battle started with an ambush.

slackOff.name: Slack Off
slackOff.description: Allows you to occasionally spend class time to read, study, or make infiltration tools.

housekeeping.name: Housekeeping
housekeeping.description: Kawakami can make coffee or handle laundry for you.

freeTime.name: Free Time
freeTime.description: Increases the frequency of Slack Off.

superHousekeeping.name: Super Housekeeping
superHousekeeping.description: Kawakami can also make curry or infiltration tools.

specialMassage.name: Special Massage
specialMassage.description: Kawakami offers a massage that lets you go out at night after exploring the metaverse
